kuài /kuai4/
1. (bound form) to reckon accounts
2. rapid; quick; speed; rate; soon; almost; to make haste; clever; sharp (of knives or wits); forthright; plainspoken; gratified; pleased; pleasant
3. lump; chunk; piece
4. classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc
5. (coll.) classifier for money and currency units
6. broker
7. chopstick
8. chopped meat or fish
9. used in »kuàiyú«; minced or diced fish
10. throat; to swallow
11. barn; granary
12. (literary) standard; banner (raised for battle); (literary) catapult, or a rock launched by a catapult
13. drain; stream
14. crafty; cunning
15. (literary) fast horse; (literary) fast
16. to make a top knot

kuàng /kuang4/
1. frame (e.g. door frame); casing; fig. framework; template; to circle (i.e. draw a circle around sth); to frame; to restrict; Taiwan pr. »kuāng«
2. mineral deposit; ore deposit; ore; a mine
3. moreover; situation
4. to neglect; to skip (class or work); to waste (time); vast; loose-fitting
5. (bound form) eye socket; Taiwan pr. »kuāng«
6. classical variant of »kuàng«
7. tomb
8. bright and spacious
9. fine floss-silk or cotton
10. to bestow; to confer
kuàng /kuang4/
kuàngzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

4. to neglect; to skip (class or work); to waste (time); vast; loose-fitting
5. (bound form) eye socket; Taiwan pr. »kuāng«
6. classical variant of »kuàng«
7. tomb
8. bright and spacious
9. fine floss-silk or cotton
10. to bestow; to confer
kuàng /kuang4/
kuàngguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

2. mineral deposit; ore deposit; ore; a mine
3. moreover; situation
4. to neglect; to skip (class or work); to waste (time); vast; loose-fitting

kuàng /kuang4/

kuí /kui2/
1. crotch; 15th of the 28th constellations of Chinese astronomy
2. chief; head; outstanding; exceptional; stalwart
3. consider; estimate
4. a lance
5. in opposition to; separated from
6. see »kuíshī« Polaris, the north star
7. separated; stare
8. crossroads; thoroughfare
9. place name
10. cheekbone; protrude
11. cheekbone; crossroads; high
12. (of a horse) powerful; strong
Kuí /Kui2/
1. one-legged mountain demon of Chinese mythology; Chinese mythical figure who invented music and dancing; Chinese rain god; surname Kui
2. surname Kui; Zhou Dynasty vassal state

kū /ku1/
1. to cry; to weep
2. to dig
3. (of plants) withered; (of wells, rivers, etc) dried up; (bound form) dull; boring; (bound form) residue of pressed oilseeds
4. cave; hole
5. to cut open; rip up; scoop out
6. to squat
kū /ku1/
kūzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to cry; to weep
2. to dig
3. (of plants) withered; (of wells, rivers, etc) dried up; (bound form) dull; boring; (bound form) residue of pressed oilseeds
4. cave; hole
5. to cut open; rip up; scoop out
6. to squat
kū /ku1/
kūguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to cry; to weep
2. to dig
3. (of plants) withered; (of wells, rivers, etc) dried up; (bound form) dull; boring; (bound form) residue of pressed oilseeds
4. cave; hole
5. to cut open; rip up; scoop out
6. to squat
kū /ku1/

kūn /kun1/
1. used in place names, notably Kunlun Mountains »Kūnlún«; (also used for transliteration)
2. descendant; elder brother; a style of Chinese poetry
3. one of the Eight Trigrams »bāguà«, symbolizing earth; female principle; ☷; ancient Chinese compass point: 225° (southwest)
4. quinone (chemistry)
5. fry (newly hatched fish); legendary giant fish that could transform into a giant bird »Péng«
6. descendant; elder brother
7. brilliant
8. (jade)
9. beautiful jade; bamboo
10. pants (old)
11. steel sword
12. fine horse
13. scalping; to make the head bald (as corporal punishment)

la /la5/
■ sentence-final particle, contraction of , indicating exclamation; particle placed after each item in a list of examples
lai /lai5/
■ (dialect) modal particle similar to »ne«, »la« or »láizhe«
lā /la1/
1. (onom.) sound of singing, cheering etc; (phonetic); (dialect) to chat
2. to pull; to play (a bowed instrument); to drag; to draw; to chat; (coll.) to empty one's bowels
3. (onom.) sound of wind, rain etc
lā /la1/
lāzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. (onom.) sound of singing, cheering etc; (phonetic); (dialect) to chat
2. to pull; to play (a bowed instrument); to drag; to draw; to chat; (coll.) to empty one's bowels
3. (onom.) sound of wind, rain etc
lā /la1/
lāguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. (onom.) sound of singing, cheering etc; (phonetic); (dialect) to chat
2. to pull; to play (a bowed instrument); to drag; to draw; to chat; (coll.) to empty one's bowels
3. (onom.) sound of wind, rain etc
lā /la1/
lāle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. (onom.) sound of singing, cheering etc; (phonetic); (dialect) to chat
2. to pull; to play (a bowed instrument); to drag; to draw; to chat; (coll.) to empty one's bowels
3. (onom.) sound of wind, rain etc

lái /lai2/
1. to come; (used as a substitute for a more specific verb); hither (directional complement for motion toward the speaker, as in »huílai«); ever since (as in »zìgǔyǐlái«); for the past (amount of time); (prefix) the coming ...; the next ... (as in »láishì«); (between two verbs) in order to; (after a round number) approximately; (used after »dé« to indicate possibility, as in »tándelái«, or after »bù« to indicate impossibility, as in »chībulái«)
2. name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc); Chenopodium album
3. rhenium (chemistry)
4. last
5. name of a mountain in Sichuan
6. brook; ripple
7. (bamboo)
8. mare

lángxīngǒufèi /lang2 xin1 gou3 fei4/*

láo /lao2/

2. (bound form) to toil; labor; (bound form) laborer; (bound form) meritorious deed; (bound form) fatigue; to put sb to the trouble (of doing sth); to express one's appreciation (Taiwan pr. »lào«)

5. wine or liquor with sediment
6. lawrencium (chemistry)

6. lawrencium (chemistry)
láo /lao2/

6. lawrencium (chemistry)

lǎn /lan3/
1. lazy
2. to monopolize; to seize
3. to take into one's arms; to embrace
4. to fasten (with a rope etc)
5. to take on (responsibility etc); to canvass
6. cable; hawser; to moor
7. to look at; to view; to read
8. (bound form) olive
9. disappointed
10. to soak (fruits) in hot water or limewater to remove astringent taste; to marinate in salt etc; to pickle
11. a kind of tool used to dredge up fish, water plants or river mud, consisting of a net attached to a pair of bamboo poles, which are used to open and close the net; to dredge with such a tool

lǎo /lao3/
1. prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity; old (of people); venerable (person); experienced; of long standing; always; all the time; of the past; very; outdated; (of meat etc) tough
2. male; man (Cantonese)
3. grandma (maternal)
4. rhodium (chemistry)
5. flooded; heavy rain
6. round-bottomed wicker basket; (dialect) to lift; to carry on one's shoulder
7. a noise; a sound
8. basket
9. name of a tribe
10. spokes
lǎo /lao3/
lǎozhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity; old (of people); venerable (person); experienced; of long standing; always; all the time; of the past; very; outdated; (of meat etc) tough

3. grandma (maternal)
4. rhodium (chemistry)
5. flooded; heavy rain
6. round-bottomed wicker basket; (dialect) to lift; to carry on one's shoulder
7. a noise; a sound
8. basket
9. name of a tribe
10. spokes
lǎo /lao3/
lǎoguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity; old (of people); venerable (person); experienced; of long standing; always; all the time; of the past; very; outdated; (of meat etc) tough

3. grandma (maternal)
4. rhodium (chemistry)
5. flooded; heavy rain
6. round-bottomed wicker basket; (dialect) to lift; to carry on one's shoulder
7. a noise; a sound
8. basket
9. name of a tribe
10. spokes
lǎo /lao3/
lǎole, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.

là /la4/
1. to leave out; to be missing; to leave behind or forget to bring; to lag or fall behind
2. hot (spicy); pungent; (of chili pepper, raw onions etc) to sting; to burn
3. candle; wax
4. perverse; unreasonable; absurd
5. ancient practice of offering sacrifices to the gods in the 12th lunar month; the 12th lunar month; (bound form) (of meat, fish etc) cured in winter, esp. in the 12th lunar month
6. solder; tin
7. scabies; scald-head
8. to destroy; to rip; to tear open
9. (archaic) species of tree mentioned in ancient texts
10. bald; scabby
là /la4/
làzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to leave out; to be missing; to leave behind or forget to bring; to lag or fall behind
2. hot (spicy); pungent; (of chili pepper, raw onions etc) to sting; to burn
3. candle; wax
4. perverse; unreasonable; absurd
5. ancient practice of offering sacrifices to the gods in the 12th lunar month; the 12th lunar month; (bound form) (of meat, fish etc) cured in winter, esp. in the 12th lunar month
6. solder; tin
7. scabies; scald-head
8. to destroy; to rip; to tear open
9. (archaic) species of tree mentioned in ancient texts
10. bald; scabby
là /la4/
làguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to leave out; to be missing; to leave behind or forget to bring; to lag or fall behind
2. hot (spicy); pungent; (of chili pepper, raw onions etc) to sting; to burn
3. candle; wax
4. perverse; unreasonable; absurd
5. ancient practice of offering sacrifices to the gods in the 12th lunar month; the 12th lunar month; (bound form) (of meat, fish etc) cured in winter, esp. in the 12th lunar month
6. solder; tin
7. scabies; scald-head
8. to destroy; to rip; to tear open
9. (archaic) species of tree mentioned in ancient texts
10. bald; scabby
là /la4/
làle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to leave out; to be missing; to leave behind or forget to bring; to lag or fall behind
2. hot (spicy); pungent; (of chili pepper, raw onions etc) to sting; to burn
3. candle; wax
4. perverse; unreasonable; absurd
5. ancient practice of offering sacrifices to the gods in the 12th lunar month; the 12th lunar month; (bound form) (of meat, fish etc) cured in winter, esp. in the 12th lunar month
6. solder; tin
7. scabies; scald-head
8. to destroy; to rip; to tear open
9. (archaic) species of tree mentioned in ancient texts
10. bald; scabby

léi /lei2/
1. rope; to bind together; to twist around
2. thunder
3. (bound form) (military) mine, as in »dìléi« land mine
4. (coll.) to shock; to stun; to astound
5. (Tw) (coll.) spoiler
6. (Tw) (coll.) to reveal plot details to (sb)
7. radium (chemistry)
8. to pound (with a mortar and pestle); to hit (a person); to beat (a drum); to bang on (a door)
9. (dialect) to scold
10. entangled; lean
11. to beat (old variant of »léi«)
12. (archaic) simple sedan chair for traveling in the mountains; (archaic) platter with compartments for food (also pr. »lěi«)
13. logs rolled down in defense of city
14. sedan
15. fields divided by dikes
16. (literary) thick rope used to restrain a prisoner
17. large earthenware wine jar
18. basket for carrying earth
19. to entwine; creeper; bramble; (literary) basket for carrying soil
léi /lei2/
léizhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. rope; to bind together; to twist around
2. thunder
3. (bound form) (military) mine, as in »dìléi« land mine
4. (coll.) to shock; to stun; to astound
5. (Tw) (coll.) spoiler
6. (Tw) (coll.) to reveal plot details to (sb)
7. radium (chemistry)
8. to pound (with a mortar and pestle); to hit (a person); to beat (a drum); to bang on (a door)
9. (dialect) to scold
10. entangled; lean
11. to beat (old variant of »léi«)
12. (archaic) simple sedan chair for traveling in the mountains; (archaic) platter with compartments for food (also pr. »lěi«)
13. logs rolled down in defense of city
14. sedan
15. fields divided by dikes
16. (literary) thick rope used to restrain a prisoner
17. large earthenware wine jar
18. basket for carrying earth
19. to entwine; creeper; bramble; (literary) basket for carrying soil
léi /lei2/
léiguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. rope; to bind together; to twist around
2. thunder
3. (bound form) (military) mine, as in »dìléi« land mine
4. (coll.) to shock; to stun; to astound
5. (Tw) (coll.) spoiler
6. (Tw) (coll.) to reveal plot details to (sb)
7. radium (chemistry)
8. to pound (with a mortar and pestle); to hit (a person); to beat (a drum); to bang on (a door)
9. (dialect) to scold
10. entangled; lean
11. to beat (old variant of »léi«)
12. (archaic) simple sedan chair for traveling in the mountains; (archaic) platter with compartments for food (also pr. »lěi«)

17. large earthenware wine jar
18. basket for carrying earth
19. to entwine; creeper; bramble; (literary) basket for carrying soil

Lèchāng-pòjìng /Le4chang1-po4jing4/
■ lit. the story of the broken mirror of Princess Lechang »Lèchāng Gōngzhǔ« (In the tale, the princess and her husband, fearing separation during the turbulence of war, broke a bronze mirror in half. They each kept one half as a token, with the promise to reunite by matching the pieces together. They were indeed separated, but eventually reunited, with the mirror playing a crucial role in their reunion.) (idiom); fig. the reunion of separated lovers or the restoration of a relationship

4. lotus

22. fat on intestines

24. wind in high places

6. to singe

liàn /lian4/
1. to practice; to train; to drill; to perfect (one's skill); exercise; (literary) white silk; to boil and scour raw silk
2. to feel attached to; to long for; to love
3. chain; cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m); chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m); to chain; to enchain
4. to refine; to smelt
5. Melia japonica
6. to prepare a dead body for coffin
7. to boil raw silk (to soften and clean it)
8. (literary) to moisten; to wet; to soak in water
9. full of water; trough
10. Ampelopsis japonica (creeper with root used in TCM); same as »báiliǎn«

12. clear; resounding

liú /liu2/
1. to leave (a message etc); to retain; to stay; to remain; to keep; to preserve
2. to flow; to disseminate; to circulate or spread; to move or drift; to degenerate; to banish or send into exile; stream of water or sth resembling one; class, rate or grade
3. tumor
4. sulfur (chemistry)
5. (classical) a type of battle-ax; to kill; to slaughter
6. precious stone
7. pomegranate
8. to distill; to break a liquid substance up into components by boiling
9. clear; deep (of water); swift
10. bay horse with black mane
11. lovely; beautiful
12. tassel
13. (Tw) (chemistry) lutetium
14. fine gold
15. soughing of wind

liúyú /liu2 yu2/*
liúyúzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
■ to change (for the worse)
liúyú /liu2 yu2/*
liúyúguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
■ to change (for the worse)
liúyú /liu2 yu2/*
liúyúle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
■ to change (for the worse)

liú'ànsù /liu2an4su4/
■ thiamine; vitamin B1
Liú Ān /Liu2 An1/*
■ Liu An (179-122 BC), King of Huainan under the Western Han, ordered the writing of the »Huáinánzi«
Liú Bāng /Liu2 Bang1/*
■ Liu Bang (256 or 247-195 BC), bandit leader who became first Han emperor Han Gaozu (reigned 202-195 BC)
Liú Bèi /Liu2 Bei4/*
■ Liu Bei (161-223), warlord at the end of the Han dynasty and founder of the Han kingdom of Shu (c. 200-263), later the Shu Han dynasty
Liú Biǎo /Liu2 Biao3/*
■ Liu Biao (142-208), warlord
Liú Bīnyàn /Liu2 Bin1 yan4/*
■ Liu Binyan (1925-2005), journalist and novelist, condemned by Mao as rightist faction in 1957, subsequently dissident writer
Liú Bówēn /Liu2 Bo2 wen1/*
■ Liu Bowen (1311-1375), general under the first Ming emperor Zhu Yuanzhang »Zhū Yuánzhāng«, with a reputation as a military genius, also called Liu Ji »Liú Jī«
Liú Cíxīn /Liu2 Ci2 xin1/*
■ Liu Cixin (1963-), Chinese science fiction writer
Liú Déhuá /Liu2 De2 hua2/*
■ Andy Lau (1961-), Hong Kong Cantopop singer and actor
Liú È /Liu2 E4/*
■ Liu E (1857-1909), late Qing novelist, author of »Lǎo Cán Yóujì«
Liú Guāngdì /Liu2 Guang1 di4/*
■ Liu Guangdi (1859-1898), one of the Six Gentlemen Martyrs »Wùxū Liùjūnzi« of the unsuccessful reform movement of 1898
Liú Guìjīn /Liu2 Gui4jin1/
■ Liu Guijin (1945-), Chinese diplomat, ambassador to South Africa 2001-2007
Liú Héng /Liu2 Heng2/*
■ Liu Heng, personal name of Han emperor Han Wendi ; Liu Heng (1954-), Chinese writer
Liú Hòuzǒng /Liu2 Hou4 zong3/*
■ Liu Houzong (1904-1949), originally Hunan guerilla leader, rewarded by Chiang Kaishek for killing Xiang Ying »Xiàng Yīng« during the 1941 New Fourth Army incident »Wǎnnán Shìbiàn«

liù /liu4/
1. six; 6
2. swift current; rapids
3. (dialect) (of speech, actions etc) skilled; proficient; (of movements) quick; speedy
4. (bound form) rain runoff from a roof
5. (bound form) roof gutter
6. classifier for rows, lines etc
7. surroundings; neighborhood
8. (dialect) to practice
9. (dialect) to plaster; to fill in the cracks (with cement, lime plaster etc)
10. to stroll; to walk (an animal)
11. six (banker's anti-fraud numeral)
12. to steam; to cook in a steamer; to reheat cold food by steaming it
13. to stroll; walk a horse
14. numeral 6 in the Suzhou numeral system »Sūzhōumǎzi«
15. the sound of the wind; to soar
16. (bound form) finger ring; Taiwan pr. »liú«
17. dripping of rain from eaves
18. pipit (genus Anthus)
liù /liu4/
liùzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

2. swift current; rapids
3. (dialect) (of speech, actions etc) skilled; proficient; (of movements) quick; speedy
4. (bound form) rain runoff from a roof
5. (bound form) roof gutter
6. classifier for rows, lines etc

liù /liu4/
liùguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

liù /liu4/
liùle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.

2. swift current; rapids

4. (bound form) rain runoff from a roof

Liùjīng /Liu4 jing1/*

liùqīn /liu4 qin1/*
■ six close relatives, namely: father »fù«, mother »mǔ«, older brothers »xiōng«, younger brothers »dì«, wife »qī«, male children »zǐ«; one's kin
liùqīnbùrèn /liu4 qin1 bu4 ren4/*
■ not recognizing one's family (idiom); self-centered and not making any allowances for the needs of one's relatives
liùqīnwúkào /liu4 qin1 wu2 kao4/*

liùshén /liu4 shen2/*

liùshí /liu4 shi2/*

liùshísìwèiyuán /liu4 shi2 si4 wei4 yuan2/*

liùshū /liu4 shu1/*
■ Six Methods of forming Chinese characters, according to Han dictionary Shuowen - namely, two primary methods: (pictogram), (ideogram), two compound methods: (combined ideogram), (ideogram plus phonetic), and two transfer methods: (loan), (transfer)
Liùtāo /Liu4 tao1/*
■ "Six Secret Strategic Teachings", one of the Seven Military Classics of ancient China »Wǔjīng Qīshū«, attributed to Jiang Ziya »Jiāng Zǐyá«
Liùtāo Sānlüè /Liu4 tao1 San1 lu:e4/*
■ "Six Secret Strategic Teachings" »Liùtāo« and "Three Strategies of Huang Shigong" »Sānlüè«, two of the Seven Military Classics of ancient China »Wǔjīng Qīshū«, attributed to Jiang Ziya »Jiāng Zǐyá«
liùtàntáng /liu4 tan4 tang2/*

liùwān /liu4 wan1/*
■ (dialect) to take a walk; to go for a stroll
liùwān /liu4 wan1/*
liùwānzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

liùwān /liu4 wan1/*

liùwān /liu4 wan1/*

liùwá /liu4wa2/

liùxié /liu4 xie2/*

Liù Yì /Liu4 Yi4/*
■ the Confucian Six Arts, namely: rites or etiquette »lǐ« (»lǐyí«), music »yuě« (»yīnyuè«), archery »shè« (»shèjiàn«), charioteering »yù« (»jiàchē«), calligraphy or literacy »shū« (»shízì«), mathematics or reckoning »shù« (»jìsuàn«); another name for the Six Classics »Liùjīng«

lí /li2/
1. to leave; to part from; to be away from; (in giving distances) from; without (sth); independent of; one of the Eight Trigrams »bāguà«, symbolizing fire; ☲
2. pear
3. one hundredth; centi-
4. (literary) black; dark; many; multitude
5. plow
6. a fence
7. happen to; sorrow; suffer from
8. raccoon dog; fox-like animal
9. name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc); Chenopodium album
10. bridal veil or kerchief
11. black horse; jet steed; good horse; legendary black dragon
12. dark; sallow color
13. mark
14. a divide, to partition
15. grain (unit of weight, approx. 0.065 grams); Taiwan pr. »lǐ«
16. widow
17. basket for removing earth; spade
18. rowan or mountain ash (genus Sorbus)
19. pattering (of rain); seep through
20. go with current; mucus; spittle
21. to seep through
22. black ox; yak
23. (phonetic character used in transliteration of foreign names); Taiwan pr. »lì«
24. colored glaze; glass
25. (literary) to bind; to fasten; rope
26. chenopodiaceae
27. red algae; Gracilaria, several species, some edible; Japanese ogonori; arch. used for vanilla-like herb
28. clam
29. calabash
30. bride's veil or kerchief
31. dregs of wine
32. eel
33. Chinese oriole

Lí /Li2/
1. Korea
2. Li (c. 2000 BC), sixth of the legendary Flame Emperors »Yándì« descended from Shennong »Shénnóng« Farmer God, also known as Ai »Āi«
3. Li ethnic group of Hainan Province; surname Li; abbr. for Lebanon »Líbānèn«
4. name of a river

líkāi /li2kai1/
■ to depart; to leave
líkāi /li2kai1/
líkāizhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
■ to depart; to leave
líkāi /li2kai1/
líkāiguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
■ to depart; to leave
líkāi /li2kai1/
líkāile, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
■ to depart; to leave
líkāirénshì /li2 kai1 ren2 shi4/*
■ to die; to leave this world
líkāirénshì /li2 kai1 ren2 shi4/*
líkāirénshìzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
■ to die; to leave this world
líkāirénshì /li2 kai1 ren2 shi4/*
líkāirénshìguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
■ to die; to leave this world
líkāirénshì /li2 kai1 ren2 shi4/*
líkāirénshìle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
■ to die; to leave this world
líkè /li2 ke4/*
1. centigram (old) (single-character equivalent of »líkè«)
2. centigram
líkǔdélè /li2 ku3 de2 le4/*

líkǔdélè /li2 ku3 de2 le4/*

límǐ /li2 mi3/*
■ centimeter
lín /lin2/
1. (bound form) woods; forest; (bound form) circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people); (bound form) a collection (of similar things)
2. to sprinkle; to drip; to pour; to drench
3. to face; to overlook; to arrive; to be (just) about to; just before
4. gem
5. neighbor; adjacent; close to
6. (chemistry) phosphorus
7. scales (of fish, snakes etc)
8. (Cantonese) to topple; to collapse; to coax; flower bud
9. ranges of hills
10. mythical animal, said to have yellow body and white tail
11. cold; frigid
12. clear (as of water)
13. firefly
14. luster of gem
15. hernia; urinary hesitancy; erroneous variant of »má«
16. to stare at
17. rumbling of wheels
18. (literary) to select
19. phosphonium
20. continued rain
21. (literary) horse with a dappled coat
lín /lin2/
línzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

líng /ling2/
1. quick; alert; efficacious; effective; to come true; spirit; departed soul; coffin
2. zero; nought; zero sign; fractional; fragmentary; odd (of numbers); (placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one); fraction; (in mathematics) remainder (after division); extra; to wither and fall; to wither
3. (small) bell; CL: zhī
4. age; length of experience, membership etc
5. to approach; to rise high; thick ice; to insult or maltreat
6. (literary) to hear; to listen
7. mound; tomb; hill; mountain
8. (old) actor; actress; (meaningless bound form)
9. antelope
10. (onom.) ting-a-ling (in compounds such as or ); tinkling of gem-pendants
11. damask; thin silk
12. sound of water flowing
13. (bound form) water caltrop (Trapa species)
14. (bound form) a (window) lattice; latticework
15. tail feathers; plume
16. zero
17. mound; tomb
18. to dawdle; the name of the father of the Emperor Yao
19. (literary) (of a woman) intelligent; (used mostly in female names)
20. Eurya japonica
21. concave channels of tiling
22. bamboo screen
23. small boat with windows
24. fungus; tuber
25. withered (plant, herb etc)
26. sandfly
27. to sell
28. lattice work on front and sides
29. name of a district in Hunan
30. name of a wine
31. drops of rain; to fall in drops
32. mud carp (Cirrhina molitorella)
33. dragon

Lín Sēn /Lin2 Sen1/*
■ Lin Sen (1868-1943), revolutionary politician, colleague of Sun Yat-sen, chairman of the Chinese nationalist government (1928-1932)
Lín Shū /Lin2 Shu1/*
■ Lin Shu (1852-1924), writer and influential translator and adaptor of vast swathes of Western literature into Classical Chinese

lǐ /li3/
1. lining; interior; inside; internal; also written »lǐ«
2. li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m; neighborhood; ancient administrative unit of 25 families; (Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township »zhèn« and neighborhood »lín« levels
3. texture; grain (of wood); inner essence; intrinsic order; reason; logic; truth; science; natural science (esp. physics); to manage; to pay attention to; to run (affairs); to handle; to put in order; to tidy up
4. gift; rite; ceremony; CL: fèn
5. propriety; etiquette; courtesy
6. plum
7. mile
8. lithium (chemistry)
9. carp
10. rustic; vulgar; unrefined; abbr. for »lǐyǔ«, slang
11. nautical mile
12. worried; afflicted
13. wood-boring insect
14. ceremonial vessel
15. winding
16. sweet wine
17. snakefish; snakehead mullet
lǐ /li3/
lǐzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. lining; interior; inside; internal; also written »lǐ«
2. li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m; neighborhood; ancient administrative unit of 25 families; (Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township »zhèn« and neighborhood »lín« levels
3. texture; grain (of wood); inner essence; intrinsic order; reason; logic; truth; science; natural science (esp. physics); to manage; to pay attention to; to run (affairs); to handle; to put in order; to tidy up
4. gift; rite; ceremony; CL: fèn
5. propriety; etiquette; courtesy
6. plum
7. mile
8. lithium (chemistry)
9. carp
10. rustic; vulgar; unrefined; abbr. for »lǐyǔ«, slang
11. nautical mile
12. worried; afflicted
13. wood-boring insect
14. ceremonial vessel
15. winding
16. sweet wine
17. snakefish; snakehead mullet
lǐ /li3/
lǐguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

lǐ /li3/
lǐle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. lining; interior; inside; internal; also written »lǐ«
2. li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m; neighborhood; ancient administrative unit of 25 families; (Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township »zhèn« and neighborhood »lín« levels
3. texture; grain (of wood); inner essence; intrinsic order; reason; logic; truth; science; natural science (esp. physics); to manage; to pay attention to; to run (affairs); to handle; to put in order; to tidy up

Lǐ /Li3/
1. surname Li; abbr. for »Lǐjì«, Classic of Rites
2. old name for the »Lí« ethnic group
3. Lishui River in north Hunan, flowing into Lake Dongting »Dòngtíng Hú«; surname Li

lì /li4/
1. power; force; strength; ability; strenuously
2. sharp; favorable; advantage; benefit; profit; interest; to do good to; to benefit
3. to stand; to set up; to establish; to lay down; to draw up; at once; immediately
4. beautiful
5. grain; granule; pellet; particle
6. classifier for small round objects (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)
7. (Tw) classifier for larger round objects (watermelon etc)
8. example; precedent; rule; case; instance
9. (literary) cold; chilly; (bound form) to tremble with fear
10. calendar
11. chestnut
12. to experience; to undergo; to pass through; all; each; every; history
13. to encourage; to urge
14. strict; severe
15. bamboo rain hat
16. minor government official or functionary (old)
17. oyster
18. to bend; to violate; to go against; ruthless and tyrannical
19. oak; Quercus serrata
20. to drip; to strain or filter; a trickle
21. husband and wife
22. archaic variant of , oak; type of tree in ancient books; stable (for horses)
23. name of a river
24. dysentery
25. (bound form) gravel; small stone
26. litchi
27. (bound form) a person in servitude; low-ranking subordinate; (bound form) to be subordinate to; (bound form) clerical script (the style of characters intermediate between ancient seal and modern regular characters)
28. cold; frigid
29. (final particle); sound; noise
30. cry of a crane or wild goose
31. sound of splitting; cracking
32. hole, pit
33. high mountain range
34. sorrowful
35. hedge
36. type of oak; stable (for horses)
37. beam
38. miasma
39. to attend (official functions)
40. brilliance (pearls)
41. ulcer; plague
42. luster (of pearls)
43. unreasonable; violent
44. cross stream by stepping on stones
45. grind; sandstone
46. bamboos good for poles; horn
47. coarse rice
48. (cattle) tongue (Cantonese)
49. (herb); pigsty
50. to attend (an official function); to be present; to administer; to approach (esp. as administrator)
51. Drabanemerosa hebecarpa
52. to curse; to scold
53. move; walk
54. to bully; wheel-rut
55. livermorium (chemistry); (old) (Italian) lira (loanword); (archaic) type of food vessel used in Funan »Fúnán«
56. bald; scabby
57. ancient ceramic three-legged vessel used for cooking with cord markings on the outside and hollow legs
58. Alcedo bengalensis
lì /li4/
lìzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. power; force; strength; ability; strenuously
2. sharp; favorable; advantage; benefit; profit; interest; to do good to; to benefit
3. to stand; to set up; to establish; to lay down; to draw up; at once; immediately
4. beautiful

Lì /Li4/
1. river in Hebei
2. surname Li; ancient place name
lìbānfùwú /li4ban1fu4wu2/
■ (bird species of China) Jankowski's bunting (Emberiza jankowskii)
lìbān dùjuān /li4ban1 du4juan1/
■ (bird species of China) banded bay cuckoo (Cacomantis sonneratii)
lìbáixìbāo /li4 bai2 xi4 bao1/*
■ white granulocyte (blood cell)
Lìbǎibìngdú /Li4 bai3 bing4 du2/*
■ Nipah virus
lìbǎo /li4 bao3/*
■ to seek to protect; to ensure; to maintain; to guard
lìbǎo /li4 bao3/*
lìbǎozhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
■ to seek to protect; to ensure; to maintain; to guard

lóng /long2/
1. Chinese dragon; loong; (fig.) emperor; dragon; (bound form) dinosaur
2. grand; intense; prosperous; to swell; to bulge
3. deaf
4. enclosing frame made of bamboo, wire etc; cage; basket
5. steamer basket
6. cavity; hole
7. rapids; waterfall; torrential (rain)
8. steep; precipitous (of mountain)
9. (literary) window; (literary) cage for animals
10. tinkling of gem-pendants
11. infirmity; retention of urine
12. (dialect) tool used to hull rice (similar to a grain mill); (dialect) to hull rice using this tool
13. Polygonum posumbu
14. long and wide valley
15. to walk

lǒng /long3/
1. to envelop; to cover; (used in »lǒngzi«) large box; Taiwan pr. »lóng«
2. to gather together; to collect

4. to add; to sum up
5. to comb (hair)
6. rude; barbarous
7. ridge between fields; crop row; mounded soil forming a ridge in a field; grave mound
lǒng /long3/
lǒngzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to envelop; to cover; (used in »lǒngzi«) large box; Taiwan pr. »lóng«
2. to gather together; to collect
3. to approach; to draw near to
4. to add; to sum up
5. to comb (hair)
6. rude; barbarous
7. ridge between fields; crop row; mounded soil forming a ridge in a field; grave mound
lǒng /long3/
lǒngguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to envelop; to cover; (used in »lǒngzi«) large box; Taiwan pr. »lóng«
2. to gather together; to collect
3. to approach; to draw near to
4. to add; to sum up
5. to comb (hair)
6. rude; barbarous
7. ridge between fields; crop row; mounded soil forming a ridge in a field; grave mound
lǒng /long3/

4. to add; to sum up

luò /luo4/
1. to fall or drop; (of the sun) to set; (of a tide) to go out; to lower; to decline or sink; to lag or fall behind; to fall onto; to rest with; to get or receive; to write down; whereabouts; settlement
2. to cough up; also pr. »kǎ«
3. net-like object; to hold sth in place with a net; to wind; to twist; (TCM) channels in the human body
4. to pile up; to stack; a pile; a stack
5. camel; white horse with a black mane (archaic)
6. neck-ornament
7. name of a river
8. brindled ox; clear; eminent
9. string on which coins are strung
10. black horse with white mane; fearful

lún /lun2/
1. wheel; disk; ring
2. steamship
3. to take turns; to rotate
4. classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
5. human relationship; order; coherence
6. to select
7. to arrange
8. to sink (into ruin, oblivion); to be reduced to
9. (used in female names) (old)
10. to classify; to twist silk; silk thread
11. tree name (archaic)
12. (metal); roentgenium (chemistry)
lún /lun2/
lúnzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. wheel; disk; ring
2. steamship
3. to take turns; to rotate
4. classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
5. human relationship; order; coherence
6. to select
7. to arrange
8. to sink (into ruin, oblivion); to be reduced to
9. (used in female names) (old)
10. to classify; to twist silk; silk thread
11. tree name (archaic)
12. (metal); roentgenium (chemistry)
lún /lun2/
lúnguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

2. steamship
3. to take turns; to rotate

5. human relationship; order; coherence
6. to select
7. to arrange

9. (used in female names) (old)

12. (metal); roentgenium (chemistry)
lún /lun2/
lúnle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.

■ Roh Tae-woo (1932-), South Korean politician, president 1988-1993
Lú Wǔxuàn /Lu2 Wu3 xuan4/*
■ Roh Moo-hyun (1946-2009), South Korean lawyer and politician, president 2003-2008
Lú Zhàolín /Lu2 Zhao4 lin2/*
■ Lu Zhaolin (637-689), one of the Four Great Poets of the Early Tang »Chū Táng Sìjié«
lǔ /lu3/
1. (bound form) crass; stupid; rude; (used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
2. (bound form) to capture (sb)
3. prisoner of war; to capture; to take prisoner; (old) northern barbarian; slave
4. to stew in soy sauce and spices
5. alkaline soil; salt; brine; halogen (chemistry); crass; stupid
6. scull (single oar worked from side to side over the stern of a boat)
7. lutetium (chemistry)
8. sal ammoniac
lǔ /lu3/
lǔzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. (bound form) crass; stupid; rude; (used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
2. (bound form) to capture (sb)
3. prisoner of war; to capture; to take prisoner; (old) northern barbarian; slave
4. to stew in soy sauce and spices
5. alkaline soil; salt; brine; halogen (chemistry); crass; stupid
6. scull (single oar worked from side to side over the stern of a boat)
7. lutetium (chemistry)
8. sal ammoniac
lǔ /lu3/
lǔguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. (bound form) crass; stupid; rude; (used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
2. (bound form) to capture (sb)
3. prisoner of war; to capture; to take prisoner; (old) northern barbarian; slave
4. to stew in soy sauce and spices
5. alkaline soil; salt; brine; halogen (chemistry); crass; stupid
6. scull (single oar worked from side to side over the stern of a boat)
7. lutetium (chemistry)
8. sal ammoniac
lǔ /lu3/
lǔle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. (bound form) crass; stupid; rude; (used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
2. (bound form) to capture (sb)
3. prisoner of war; to capture; to take prisoner; (old) northern barbarian; slave
4. to stew in soy sauce and spices
5. alkaline soil; salt; brine; halogen (chemistry); crass; stupid
6. scull (single oar worked from side to side over the stern of a boat)
7. lutetium (chemistry)
8. sal ammoniac

1. road; CL: tiáo
2. journey
3. route
4. line (bus etc)
5. sort; kind
6. to carve wood
7. diary; record; to hit; to copy
8. dew; syrup; nectar; outdoors (not under cover); to show; to reveal; to betray; to expose
9. deer
10. (bound form) land (as opposed to the sea)
11. good fortune; official salary
12. (bound form used in »mánglù«, »láolù«, »yōnglù« etc)
13. heron
14. to peel with a knife
15. (bound form) to kill
16. beautiful jade
17. bribe; bribery
18. windlass
19. luxuriant growth
20. to despise; to insult
21. (bound form) to join (forces)
22. a clod of earth; land
23. clear (water); strain liquids
24. strain liquids
25. (jade)
26. box case
27. late-planted early-ripening grain
28. box; basket
29. (bamboo)

35. to walk cautiously; to walk aimlessly
36. name of a wine
37. rhodium (chemistry) (old)
38. (horse)
39. Pomatomus saltatrix; bluefish
40. foot of a hill

lüè /lu:e4/
1. brief; sketchy
2. outline; summary
3. to omit
4. (bound form before a single-character verb) a bit; somewhat; slightly
5. plan; strategy
6. to capture (territory)
7. to take over by force; to rob; to plunder; to brush over; to skim; to sweep
8. (old) to beat; to pound
9. (ancient unit of weight)

1. (coll.) what?

4. hemp

8. toad
